column4: I was wonder if anyone knows why DVD-RWs might be recognized for a second and then quickly dissappear
see the results of  dmesg perhaps?
Can you help me interpret? http://pastebin.com/R3uR2dTn
it seems okay, what is the issue?
Essentially if I manage to blank a disk via Brasero it seems to bork it
and sometimes when I just put a disk in it will recognize it for a second and then go away
insert a non-blank dvd after.. can it read it?
I put a music CD in and it wasn't recognized
I can eject by going eject /dev/cdrom but it doesn't automount, although it does show up for a moment
look in your /etc/fstab file to see how the cdrom/dvd is mounting
Once more I have no idea what this should look like: http://pastebin.com/irvfHDT8
What does the manual mount command look like? Would that help?
man mount  please  and i believe it has a sample command there n the man pages
sudo mount /dev/scd0 /media/cdrom0 doesn't work, but could I do something similar to recognize the disk?
